\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	X & {M_k } & X & {\varinjlim ^{fil}M_k } \\
	{M_j } & {M_j \sqcup _{X}M_k} & {M_j} & {M_j \sqcup _X\varinjlim ^{fil}M_k }
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, dashed, from=1-2, to=2-1]
	\arrow[from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{\text{split}}", hook, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\text{split}}"', hook, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{e_j}"{description}, dashed, from=2-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{\text{pure.}}"', hook, from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["\circlearrowright"{description}, draw=none, from=1-1, to=0]
	\arrow["\circlearrowright"{description}, draw=none, from=1-3, to=1]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
